verses.verse: <S%H4910>Dominion<s%> and <S%H6343>fear<s%> are with him, he <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in his <S%H4791>high<s%> places.
Is there any <S%H4557>number<s%> of his <S%H1416>armies?<s%> and on <S%H4310>whom<s%> does not his <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H6965>arise?<s%>
<S%H4100>How<s%> then can <S%H582>man<s%> be <S%H6663>justified<s%> with <S%H410>God?<s%> or <S%H637>how<s%> can he be <S%H2135>clean<s%> that is <S%H3205>born<s%> of a <S%H802>woman?<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold<s%> even to the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> and it <S%H166>shines<s%> not; yes, the <S%H3556>stars<s%> are not <S%H2141>pure<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight.<s%>
<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> less <S%H582>man,<s%> that is a <S%H7415>worm?<s%> and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> which is a <S%H8438>worm?<s%>
